DOC.brief_summary: The study include two phase . In phase one reliability thoracic spine mobility measurement study subject thoracic spine pain . In phase two reliable measurement use measure effect thoracic spine manipulation subject thoracic spine pain . The change pain measure well . In second phase control group receive TNS treatment six time home placebo power TNS limit low level . The number treatment control well time treatment . The treatment group receive six manipulation treatment within 3 week period . The effect measure immediately treatment week , 3 8 week follow-up . Moreover one year follow-up perform mail questionnaire .
DOC.brief_title: Thoracic Spine Manipulation Patients With Thoracic Spine Pain
DOC.detailed_description: Outcome measure intensity pain ( VAS , Roland-Morris questionnaire ) thoracic mobility ( measure computer , tape measurement , inclinometer manually ) .
DOC.criteria: Thoracic spine pain , 1855 year old Inflammatory spine disease , previous surgery thoracic spine area , osteoporosis
